description:
Pilot one of the many boats as you admire the view! Visit famous landmarks including Rialto Bridge, Murano Island & San Marco Square. With 50 missions of increasing complexity and difficulty, you will start out slow, but will have to learn the ropes of being a captain quickly.

GAME FEATURES
▶ HUGE BOAT COLLECTION: Feel truly free using 10 Awesome Boats
▶ DYNAMIC TRAFFIC: Maneuver between other Boats
▶ PRO PARKING MISSIONS: Huge campaign to beat, earn in-game money for your progress
▶ CAMERAS: Multiple cameras including First Person view for full immersion

Sailing boats and yachts are not all that awaits you. The game also features speedboats and gondolas for increased variety. Each of them controls differently and will require that you adjust what you’d learned accordingly. You will also have to mind the inertia that affects the way your vehicle moves.

10 DIFFERENT VEHICLES
From fast speedboats and motor yachts to sailing boats and gondolas, each in-game vehicle poises its own unique challenge. Learn to pilot them all!

WATER TRAFFIC
Venice is a busy city and its canals are never empty. You will have to watch out for other people cruising along the canals. Don't hit a gondola with your speedboat!

BEAUTIFUL CITY VIEWS
This famous city is a sight to behold and the game captures its unique feeling. There truly is no other place like it on Earth – just see for yourself!

REALISTIC GRAPHICS
Marvel at the beautiful views, witness lifelike reflections on water and admire all the different boats the game has to offer!
name: Venice Taxi Boats
